yards p purl link to video cm centimeters st - stitch mt meter sts stitches mm - millimeters k2tog knit 2 together link to video gm - gram p2tog purl 2 together link to video oz ounce ssk slip slip knit link in video round round yarn fingering weight sock yarn the original yarn used in the pattern regia alpaca soft 1 skein 15% alpaca 62% merino wool 23% polyamide 3 52 oz/339 yds 100 gm/310 mt i can also recommend the following yarns drops nord 2 skeins 45% alpaca 25% wool 30% polyamide 1 76 oz/191 yds 50 gm/175 mt or regia 6-ply 75% wool/ 25% polyamide 5 29 oz/410 yds 150 gm/375 mt or novita 7 brothers 75% wool/ 25% polyamide 3 52 oz/219 yds 100 gm/200 mt more socks yarn webs usa knitpicks europa lovecrafts uk woolwarehouse sew-shop i also recommend choosing a thread with a small amount of polyamide in the composition this will make your socks stronger needles and accessories  circular needles 31 -40 80-100 cm long and the magic loop technique or one set of 4 double pointed needles size 11/ 2 2 us 2 5-2 75 mm or size needed to obtain gauge try both and use whichever you are most comfortable with  tapestry needle  scissors  stitch marker optional gaude stockinette stitch 26 sts and 38 row = 4 inches 10 cm © 2023 cozysocksstore all rights reserved all patterns and photographs are the property of yulia ilinkova cozysocksstore and are purchased under the agreement that the patterns and photographs cannot be distributed copied in part or in whole re-written or re-sold without permission for personal non-commercial use only e-mail cozysocksstore@gmail com 2 start knitting i used the magic loop method but you can use a set of 4 double pointed needles simply divide into 3 needles first needle 30 stitches second needle 15 stitches third needle 15 stitches when knitting the heel flap you have to join the stitches of the second and third knitting needles to one knitting needle cuff cast on 60
